Message:
My desire to show
my gratitude to Sol
kept my hands moving,
and somehow, I finished
making the present.

Thank goodness...
I made it just in time...
It’s a little misshapen...
but it’s fine.

With me as I am now,
this is the best job I can do.

Feelings cannot be seen,
which is why we express them
by giving them shape.
Like, a present filled
to the brim with our feelings.

By the way,
that girl from earlier...
Was she one of Sol’s friends?

I’ll have to thank her
the next time I see her.

Huh, it’s already this late?!
Oh no! I need to hurry
and get ready!
